title: Most Efficient Business Entry
description: In 2024, Rwanda achieved a perfect score of 100 in the operational efficiency of business entry, indicating the highest level of efficiency globally.

title: High Gender Representation in Parliament
description: As of 2024, 63.75% of seats in Rwanda's national parliament are held by women, showcasing one of the highest gender representations in the world.

title: Ease of Resolving Commercial Disputes
description: Rwanda scored 94.63 in 2024 for ease of resolving commercial disputes, reflecting a highly efficient dispute resolution system.

title: Low Diarrhea Treatment Coverage
description: In 2020, only 19.3% of children under 5 in Rwanda received oral rehydration and continued feeding for diarrhea, indicating one of the lowest treatment coverages globally.
